isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - 10 SPEED AND 15 SPEED TRANSMISSIONS EATON RT, RTO, AND RTX SERIES - INSTALL - GEAR SHIFT LEVER HOUSING ASSEMBLY

step1.para: Check the shifter housing assembly to make sure shift block and yoke notches are aligned in the neutral position ( Figure 293).

figure.caption: Figure 293. Make Sure Shift Block and Yoke Notches Are Aligned in Neutral Position

step1.para: Install the new gear shift lever housing gasket in position on the shifter housing. Install the gear shift lever housing assembly on the shifter housing, fitting the lever into the shift block and yoke notches ( Figure 294).

figure.caption: Figure 294. Install Gear Shift Lever Housing Assembly on Shifter Housing

step1.para: Apply Loctite 242 to the bolt threads. Install the retaining bolts and tighten to 35 to 45 ft-lbs. (47 to 61 N·m) ( Figure 295).

figure.caption: Figure 295. Install Retaining Bolts and Tighten
